Reviews.Title: Super Fast, Great Battery life when you use the extended battery
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great computer, right after I purchased this computer I also purchased an additional battery from sony that attached right to the bottom of the computer doubling the battery capacity. Now I can be away from the office without worrying about needing to find an outlet. The hard drive is SUPER fast 2 ssd hd in raid 0.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5 2450M Processor 2.5GHz
6 GB DDR3 ram
256 GB solid state hard drive (2x 128 GB ssd)
13.3-Inch Screen
ProductInfo.Name: Sony VAIO VPCSA45GX/BI 13.3 Inch Laptop (Jet Black)
